item.title: Error With Adding A Command? Please take a look at this!
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

When i was trying to add this command on my 317 server i got 4 errors,
First let me show you the command i was adding:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("coords")&& playerRights >= 2) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY); }

And here is the picture of the errors i got when i was trying to compile:

HELP PLEASE I REALLY NEED THE COORDS COMMAND ITS VERY IMPORTANT

Read full topic
